comment: 理學院一年級(數學系、物理系、化學系、生科系、地科系、資工系) 、光電工程學士學位學程(能力分班)
restrict: ◎第一階段需人工加選◎第二階段需人工加選◎加退選階段需人工加選
description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

**Grading**

**Attendance and Participation 20%**

oPunctual attendance and active participation in class are highly expected.

#If you miss more than 4 sessions, you may fail this class.

#You are expected to work in pairs and in groups. Be a responsible partner. Finish what you need to finish before coming to class.

#If you have to miss a class, please email me in advance, inform your group partners in advance, and mark it on the sign-in sheet.

#If you are habitually late, points will be deducted.

**Midterm: Book Talk 25%**

oPoster

Option 1. Make an ID card which belongs to one of the characters in your selected book. The ID

should include a picture and all information found on a real ID card.

Option 2. Make a map showing where the story took place.

oPresentation: Present either the ID or the Map. 2 mins. Try not to read from your script.

oA Letter to the character

\# Write a letter to one of the characters in your selected book. Please type your letter.

**Final: Show and Tell – About Me Presentation 25%**

oPresentation

#Theme: Follow the guidelines of Show and Tell competition.

#Use visual aids (photos, posters, etc.). 2 mins.

oScript

#Hard copy

**Activities & Assignments 20%**

oActivity worksheets and literature circle role sheets

o2 Study Journals. Each should include:

#Outlines (key points/ summary) of the reading

#8 phrases and vocabulary, and their example sentence(s)

#1 discussion question and your group’s comments on this question

#1 piece of paper

oLexile Online Reading and Practice

oReading Week #1, 2, 3 (Seasaw Journal)

**Lexile Pre-Test 10%**

**Bonus 5%+**

oSubmit a file to illustrate your self-study work at the end of the semester. Include date, activity, and any other details you would like to include.
